item.title: Migrating from 11ty to Hugo
item.description:
I recently upgraded this website to 11ty v2.0, but I needed more change. Initially I just wanted to create a basic Design with Terminal.css. But then I randomly stumbled over the Hugo Theme Gallery and found some beautiful themes! So I chose to use Hugo Papermod and migrate the Website to Hugo ðŸ¤“. Since I don’t really know JavaScript, so it doesn’t matter for me that Hugo uses Go instead. I never used Go as a programming language, but it sounds great.
I’ll just ramble a bit now what I did to migrate my blog.
